00061     ResourceManager::ResourceManager()
00062     {
00063         this->Priority = 20;
00064         OgreResource = Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00065 
00066     }

00068     ResourceManager::~ResourceManager()
00069     {
00070         for(std::vector<ResourceInputStream*>::iterator Iter = DeleteList.begin(); Iter != DeleteList.end(); Iter++)
00071             { delete *Iter; }
00072     }
00073 
00074     void ResourceManager::ApplyShapeToActor(ActorBase* Actor, btCollisionShape* ColShape)
00075     {
00076         if(ActorBase::Actorrigid == Actor->GetType())
00077         {
00078             btRigidBody* Rigid = static_cast < btRigidBody* > (Actor->CollisionObject);
00079             btScalar mass = Rigid->getInvMass();
00080             mass=1/mass;
00081             btVector3 inertia(0,0,0);
00082             ColShape->calculateLocalInertia(mass, inertia);
00083             Rigid->setMassProps(mass,inertia);
00084         }
00085         if(ActorBase::Actorragdoll == Actor->GetType())
00086         {
00087         }
00088         if(!Actor->ShapeIsSaved)
00089         {
00090             delete Actor->Shape;
00091         }
00092         Actor->CollisionObject->setCollisionShape(ColShape);
00093         Actor->Shape = ColShape;
00094     }
00095 
00096     bool ResourceManager::ExportShapeData(ActorBase* Actor, const String &FileName)
00097     {
00098         //Copy pasta'd from Erwin Coumans with permission
00099         btDefaultSerializer* Serializer = new btDefaultSerializer(1024*1024*5);
00100         Serializer->startSerialization();
00101         int len = Actor->Shape->calculateSerializeBufferSize();
00102         btChunk* chunk = Serializer->allocate(len,1);
00103         const char* structType = Actor->Shape->serialize(chunk->m_oldPtr, Serializer);
00104         Serializer->finalizeChunk(chunk,structType,BT_SHAPE_CODE,Actor->Shape);
00105         Serializer->finishSerialization();
00106         FILE* f2 = fopen(FileName.c_str(),"wb");
00107         size_t verify = fwrite(Serializer->getBufferPointer(),Serializer->getCurrentBufferSize(),1,f2);
00108         fclose(f2);
00109         if(1 != verify)
00110         {
00111             return false;
00112         }
00113         return true;
00114     }
00115 
00116     bool ResourceManager::ImportShapeData(ActorBase* Actor, const String &FileName)
00117     {
00118         btBulletWorldImporter* Importer = new btBulletWorldImporter();
00119 
00120         //Check root directory first
00121         if(Importer->loadFile(FileName.c_str()))
00122         {
00123             btCollisionShape* shape = Importer->getCollisionShapeByIndex(0);
00124             if(shape)
00125             {
00126                 ApplyShapeToActor(Actor, shape);
00127                 delete Importer;
00128                 return true;
00129             }
00130             delete Importer;
00131             return false;
00132         }
00133 
00134         Ogre::DataStreamPtr Stream = OgreResource->openResource(FileName);
00135         assert(sizeof(char)==1);
00136         char* buffer = new char[Stream->size()];
00137         Stream->read((void*)buffer, Stream->size());
00138         if(Importer->loadFileFromMemory(buffer, Stream->size()))
00139         {
00140             btCollisionShape* shape = Importer->getCollisionShapeByIndex(0);
00141             if(shape)
00142             {
00143                 ApplyShapeToActor(Actor, shape);
00144                 delete buffer;
00145                 delete Importer;
00146                 return true;
00147             }
00148             delete buffer;
00149             delete Importer;
00150             return false;
00151         }
00152 
00153         delete buffer;
00154         delete Importer;
00155         return false;
00156     }

00173     ResourceInputStream* ResourceManager::GetResourceStream(const String& FileName)
00174     {
00175         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00176         World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Entering ResourceManager::GetResourceStream(const String& FileName)");
00177         #endif
00178         internal::OgreDataStreamBuf *TempBuffer = new internal::OgreDataStreamBuf(OgreResource->openResource(FileName));
00179         ResourceInputStream *Results =  new ResourceInputStream(TempBuffer, this);
00180         this->DeleteList.push_back(Results);
00181         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00182         World::GetWorldPointer()->Log("Exiting ResourceManager::GetResourceStream(const String& FileName)");
00183         #endif
00184         return Results;
00185     }
